name: multipurpose felted flower neckless ornament lovely gift!
description:
Dear Shoppers!

This is a listing for a multipurpose felted flower!

CHOOSE FROM AVAILABLE DESIGNS (picture) OR ORDER A CUSTOM MADE!

SUPER PRESENT FOR CHRISTMAS!

Either for a women or a child. 

You can wear them as a:

lovely neckless
bracelet
hair ornament
clothes decoration
or in any other way you find them decorating!


felted line/twine of approx. length around 49 cm (19 inch) so can be easily tighten around your neck.

approx. 7 cm (3 inch) in diameter.


I'm using a combined technique to make my flowers so you can benefit from both - softness of needle felt and durability of wet felt! (this is something in between wet and needle felt in touch)

you can be sure that they gonna look lovely on you!

There is an option for custom made flowers - other colors, sizes, line lengths etc
Ask for any details before you commit to buy.

Many thanks for shopping!
from Peaspie

name: warm soft felted scarf lovely christmas gift
description:
This is a listing for a lovely, felted and very warm scarf designed and by myself form merino wool and tussah silk tops.
VERY SOFT!

IT WILL COLOR THE WINTER FOR YOU!

100% natural materials

color is green (various shades) with little red flowers

length is approx. 150 cm/60inch
width is approx. 15 cm/5.9 inch

This is a perfect christmas gift either for a women and a child!

Custom order: this item is unique, stock of this specific material used to made this scarf is currently unavailable. 
there is although possibility to order similar scarf in different shade of green or in other color please ask me for details before you commit to buy.

Many thanks for visiting my shop!
Peaspie
